mainHero.title: Welcome to DatSilo
mainHero.subtitle: Your Trusted, Security-Oriented, and Serverless File Manager
mainHero.description: Enhance your file management and storage experience with DatSilo. DatSilo leverages cryptographic technology in order to efficiently store and manage your files.

items.title: Store your files in ways never before
items.description: DatSilo believes in reaping what you sow. What we sow here is the files and what we sow here is their efficient management without the need of big bulky data servers because all we need is users to let it be how it is.

items.title: Make it your own and make it secure!
items.description: Get your own personalized and secure Drive to store and manage your files in the most secure and efficient way possible. Go serverless like never before.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: DatSilo uses latest and best complex technologies and techniques to keep your file storage efficient and secure.

items.name: Secure
items.description: DatSilo encrypts all your files before storing them and decrypts only when you require them again.

items.name: Chunking
items.description: DatSilo chunks all your files, spreading them out evenly before storing them. This increases your file security more than any other platform can offer.

items.name: Serverless because we got better connectivity
items.description: DatSilo does not need server storage. Our users are made to be in an inclusive platform that results in a serverless storage system.

items.name: 24/7 Customer Support
items.description: DatSilo offers 24/7 efficient customer support that can be accessed anytime, anywhere.
